content: i hook row 1 magic_ring 6 half_double_crochet in ring pull tail of ring to close chain 1 turn 6 half_double_crochet row 2 2 half_double_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn 12 half_double_crochet ©2021 andrea lea/southern hooked stitches row 3 *1 half_double_crochet in first st 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * across 18u half_double_crochet fasten_off weave in ends attach ears to top of head ©2021 andrea lea/southern hooked stitches all that s left to do is to attach the safety eyes and hang him/her in your home
